Class IDDescriptorTable 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----IDDescriptorTable
public class IDDescriptorTable
extends Object
Identifier descriptor table. stores variables.

Author:
Ethan Georgi

IDDescriptorTable()

clearLevel1Entries()
Removes local variables.
createEntry(int, int)
Create an entry.
retrieveAttributes(int)
Fetch the Attributes of the variable in question
saveAddr(int, int)
Store the address of the variable
saveKind(int, boolean)
Store whether this is a function or not.
saveLevel(int, int)
Store the level of the variable
saveType(int, int)
Store the type of the variable
show()
show all the variables.

IDDescriptorTable 
 public IDDescriptorTable()

createEntry 
 public boolean createEntry(int inx,
                            int level)
Create an entry. make a new variable.

Parameters:
inx - the index to store this in
level - the level of the variable (1=Local, 0=Global)
Returns:
true if variable already defined in this index
saveLevel 
 public void saveLevel(int inx,
                       int level)
Store the level of the variable

Parameters:
inx - the index to store this in
level - the level of the variable (1=Local, 0=Global)
saveAddr 
 public void saveAddr(int inx,
                      int addr)
Store the address of the variable

Parameters:
inx - the index to store this in
addr - the address of the variable
saveType 
 public void saveType(int inx,
                      int type)
Store the type of the variable

Parameters:
inx - the index to store this in
type - the type of the variable (1=Local, 0=Global)
saveKind 
 public void saveKind(int inx,
                      boolean func)
Store whether this is a function or not.

Parameters:
inx - the index to store this in
func - i'm a little func-tion, short and stout.
retrieveAttributes 
 public Attributes retrieveAttributes(int inx)
Fetch the Attributes of the variable in question

Parameters:
inx - the index of the variable to fetch.
Returns:
the Attributes of the variable you asked for
clearLevel1Entries 
 public void clearLevel1Entries()
Removes local variables. Run for the hills.

show all the variables. kinda doesn't work.
